creator: hauser@acm.org
markt@apache.org
text: As per JSP.5.3 (JSP 2.2 spec) Tomcat follows the recommendation that a translation time error is raised if the bean has not been introduced. This includes the location in the JSP file and the name of the bean.
*** Bug 24773 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: markt@apache.org
